message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is really my bottom line. I know this product will be a game-changer for you. How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?
Thank you for considering my position, Alice. I understand your perspective, but I'm still unable to go beyond $10,000 for this product. I hope we can find a way to meet in the middle.
